# Charm Monster, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Charm Spells|charm]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Bard Spells|Bard 6]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[6th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 6]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 254

This spell functions like *[[Charm Monster (Spell)|charm monster]]**,* except that *mass charm monster* affects a number of creatures whose combined HD do not exceed twice your level, or at least one creature regardless of HD. If there are more potential targets than you can affect, you choose them one at a time until you must choose a creature with too many HD to affect.
